subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Jens Voigt made a late charge to overtake the American rider Levi Leipheimer and win the sixth stage of the Tour of Germany yesterday to maintain his overall lead. Voigt, a German who rides for CSC, won the stage by a second after emerging from a tunnel near the finish line before Leipheimer. Voigt has a 23-second lead over Leipheimer.
